scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Luke the Evangelist, identifiable by his halo and the ox symbol behind him, painting an icon of the Virgin Mary and Child. He is seated, wearing a red robe and a blue headdress, and is actively applying paint to a small panel on an easel with a brush. He holds a palette in his left hand. The background is dark, suggesting an indoor or studio setting, with a golden border framing the entire composition.
scene_interpretation: Saint Luke painting the Virgin Mary
